data.text: Bɔ me ho ban, Ao Onyankopɔn,
Ahotefoɔ a wɔwɔ asase no so deɛ,
Wɔn a wɔdi anyame afoforɔ akyire no
Awurade, wode me kyɛfa ne me kuruwa ama me;
Mʼahyeɛ akɔdeda mmea a ɛhɔ yɛ ahomeka;
Mɛkamfo Awurade a ɔtu me fo;
Mehunu Awurade wɔ mʼani so daa nyinaa.
Ɛno enti, me kra ani gye, na mede me tɛkrɛma di ahurisie;
ɛfiri sɛ, worennya me awufoɔ mu.
